Text:
This is NOT the UNCUT version - it's the original  109minute Italian version, which although contains some hardcore footage, has no cum shots. If you want the full 125min UNCUT version, you'll have to buy it:

http://xploitedcinema.com/catalog/caligula-untold-story-uncut-special-edition-cover-p-10190.html

Reason? Somebody put up the full UNCUT version up as a torrent, but people were wasting their time on this shitty torrent, so the other one died.

So, you've only yourselves to blame, dumb motherfuckers that you are!
